## git hooks shared purge

Purge shared repositories.

### Synopsis

Deletes all cloned shared hook repositories locally.

```
git hooks shared purge
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for purge
```

### SEE ALSO

* [git hooks shared](git_hooks_shared.md)	 - Manages the shared hook repositories.
